Welcome to ticket 1!!

This will give you the most fps in this schools history!

No.1: Enabling hardware accel:

Press win and type "Regedit"

Copy this path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Google\Chrome

Delete the "Chrome" folder or delete the policy inside of it.

Launch or relaunch chrome.

Click the three dots and click "Settings"

Go to the system tab and enable "Use graphics acceleration when available"

Relaunch chrome and you're done! (+40-80fps!)

Chrome flags:

Search: "chrome://flags/"

And enable these:

Experimental WebAssembly

Experimental WebAssembly JavaScript Promise Integration (JSPI)

GPU rasterization

Zero-copy rasterizer

Vulkan

Use Skia Renderer

Force High Performance GPU

Prerendering

Accelerated 2D canvas

Donezo!(+40-100fps!)
